column5: I heard that the Lake Winnipeg region and the Winnipeg River is mapped for Lowrance and Humminbird with Navionics. Any truth?

Map yes its true Heres a link or go to Navionics web site Its no current mapping based on the old charts And in my mind pretty pricey 280 to 300 buckshttp://www.worldfishingnetwork.com/u...t--137034.aspx
